Plot: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo. It opens in 1972, as the three are members...
Title: Blood In, Blood Out
Writer: Ross Thomas (story), Jimmy Santiago Baca (screenplay), Jeremy Iacone (screenplay), Floyd Mutrux (screenplay)
Actors: Damian Chapa, Jesse Borrego, Benjamin Bratt, Enrique Castillo
